channel.title: Need help with AllGoFreePortforwarding
channel.description:
Ok so i've posted on the topic but no reply so i think ill post here ok i have a problem i do not know where to put a code in this [code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
That is what i have in my compiler and if you look at his guide it says
"If there isn't a -cp option anywhere in the file already, add one after the java/javac command."
Than i need to add this after the -cp ./AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar
Please help i have no idea where to add it in my compiler

item.title: Need help with AllGoFreePortforwarding
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

Try:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp .;./AllGoFreePortForwarding.jar *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
